items.sentence: How many people are currently on your staff?
How many people do you know who can do this?
How many times are you going to ask me that?
How much longer do you think this will take?
How much will it cost to have my car washed?
I guess they really weren't all that hungry.
All you have to do is sit here and be quiet.
You don't need to attend tomorrow's meeting.
Mary said that her new dress cost her a lot.
Mary is your neighbor's daughter, isn't she?
Both of Tom's ex-wives are living in Boston.
I never thought that we'd agree on anything.
I heard that you paid Tom a visit yesterday.
Could you show me how to start this machine?
When are you going back to your own country?
No smoking is allowed in this train station.
If I tell you a story, will you go to sleep?
The truth is that I want to become a writer.
We collect stamps from all around the world.
The squeaking of the door gets on my nerves.
Did you know that men can get breast cancer?
My car is large enough to carry five people.
Is Tom really stupid enough to believe that?
They're going to play baseball after school.
Tom is hoping that he won't need to do that.
Tom is having trouble supporting his family.
Tom still has that guitar that you gave him.
Tom didn't know who he was supposed to meet.
I hope that our shop doesn't get vandalized.
I hope that we can do that together someday.
Tom was left behind to face the music alone.
Let's hope Tom doesn't know what we've done.
Let's hope this isn't going to happen again.
Tom and I don't plan on doing that together.
Tom and Mary got married three months later.
My father converted the garage into a study.
Are there any famous musicians on the stage?
I think that I've already told you about it.
Turn the lights off when you leave the room.
Tom hopes Mary will win, and I hope so, too.
Tom didn't like the cookies that Mary baked.
I guess we won't be seeing Tom anytime soon.
I know three boys whose fathers are doctors.
Tom was the only one that gave me a present.
I'd like to send this postcard to Australia.
Everybody needs to be a little more careful.
I can't believe you bought this stupid game.
Do you think I should go to Boston with Tom?
I've been meaning to talk to Tom about that.
How did Tom get you to donate so much money?
